API
===

A list of all of the functions included in the geostates package.

Plotting
--------

.. currentmodule:: geostates
.. autosummary::
   :toctree: generated

   plot.plot_states
   states.get_state

Shapefiles
----------

.. currentmodule:: geostates.shapefiles
.. autosummary::
   :toctree: generated
